definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: A shower of plasma followed by a shower of glass from exploding light bulbs.
sentences.chinese: 電燈泡爆炸後，與玻璃碎渣一同四濺的是等離子體。

sentences.english: The wire snapped at the wall plug and the light fused.
sentences.chinese: 牆上插座的電線短路燒斷了保險絲，電燈跟着滅了。

sentences.english: With his team of workers, he invented an electric light bulb, the phonograph.
sentences.chinese: 他作出了六千項發明，包括電燈泡，留聲機和油印機。

sentences.english: The light switch came away from the wall.
sentences.chinese: 電燈開關從牆上掉了下來。

sentences.english: I ran my head into the lamppost and hurt it.
sentences.chinese: 匆忙之中，他的頭撞到了一根電燈杆上。

sentences.english: The lights grow brighter as the earth lurches away from the sun.
sentences.chinese: 大地蹣跚着離開太陽，電燈顯得更亮。

sentences.english: You two go ahead to the movie without me,i don’t want to be a third wheel.
sentences.chinese: 你們兩個自己去看電影吧，我不想當電燈泡。

sentences.english: A fine wire heated electrically to incandescence in an electric lamp.
sentences.chinese: 白熾電燈的關鍵部分是燈泡裏的鎢絲。

sentences.english: Before electric light was invented, this oil was mostly used for burning in oil lamps.
sentences.chinese: 在電燈未發明之前，這種油脂大部份使用於點燃油燈。

sentences.english: Diddle the switch see if the light comes on.
sentences.chinese: 上下快速撥動電燈開關看看是否來電了。

sentences.english: A mother-in-law on a honeymoon is a fifth wheel.
sentences.chinese: 度蜜月時，丈母孃是個大電燈泡。

sentences.english: A 100-watt light bulb designed for outdoor use can also provide warmth.
sentences.chinese: 爲戶外使用而設計的一百瓦電燈泡也能提供溫暖。

sentences.english: I couldn't get this kind of lamp in town, so I sent away for it.
sentences.chinese: 在城裏我買不到這種電燈，所以我寄款郵購。

sentences.english: The light of a candle is dimmed by electric light.
sentences.chinese: 燭光與電燈光相比，前者就顯得暗淡無光了。

sentences.english: I felt for the electric light switch on the wall and turned it on.
sentences.chinese: 我摸索着尋找牆壁上的電燈開頭，打開了燈。

sentences.english: The people in that village have not seen electric lights, let alone TV sets.
sentences.chinese: 那個村子裏的人連電燈都沒見過，更不用說電視了。

definition: to set up an electric circuit/to electrify/to switch on/to be connected to an electricity grid/open telegram
